opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Gerke Excavating, Inc. v. United States

opinion:
548 U.S. 901 (2006)

GERKE EXCAVATING, INC.
v.
UNITED STATES.

No. 05-623.

Supreme Court of United States.

June 26, 2006

Certiorari granted, judgment vacated, and case remanded for further consideration in light of Rapanos v. United States, 547 U. S. 715 (2006).
